sources.title: Ladies ask gentlemen
sources.description:
Based on the story of L. Slavin. Thirty-year-old unmarried Nyura works as a saleswoman in a provincial town. Her life is uneventful. And it seems to Nyura that somewhere life boils and sparkles with bright carnival colors. One day she goes to a seaside resort and meets Sanya there. He is rustic and not spectacular - bears little resemblance to the bridegroom of girlish dreams. And Nyura runs away from him... Or maybe this is happiness - is it so simple and natural?

Year of production: 1980

Director: Ivan Kiasashvili
Screenwriter: Alexander Borodyansky, Karen Shahnazarov
Composer: Bogdan Trotsyuk
Cinematographer: Bek Igor
Artistic Director: Irina Shreter

Starring: Nikolay Skorobogatov, Leonid Kuravlev, Andreychenko Natalya, Fatyushin Alexander, Bozhok Tatiana, Neelova Marina, Vinogradova Maria, Karachentsov Nikolay, Nosik Valery, Soloviev Alexander, Olev Petr, Gia Peradze
